mapper.insert:
select mng_company_info_seq.nextval from dual
insert into mng_company_info(mng_comp_no, mng_comp_ctg_no, mng_comp_name, mng_comp_tel) values(#{mngCompNo},#{mngCompCtgNo},#{mngCompName},#{mngCompTel})

select comp_contract_list_seq.nextval from dual
insert into comp_contract_list(contract_no, mng_comp_no, contract_content, contract_price, contract_date, apt_no, is_add_facility) values(#{contractNo}, #{mngCompNo},#{contractContent},#{contractPrice},#{contractDate},#{aptNo},#{isAddFacility})
mapper.select: select l.*, i.mng_comp_ctg_no, i.mng_comp_name, i.mng_comp_tel, c.mng_comp_ctg_name from comp_contract_list l join mng_company_info i on l.mng_comp_no=i.mng_comp_no join MNG_COMPANY_CATEGORY c on i.mng_comp_ctg_no=c.mng_comp_ctg_no where contract_no=#{contractNo}

select l.contract_no, l.mng_comp_no, l.contract_price, l.contract_date, l.is_add_facility, i.mng_comp_ctg_no, i.mng_comp_name, i.mng_comp_tel, c.mng_comp_ctg_name from comp_contract_list l join mng_company_info i on l.mng_comp_no=i.mng_comp_no join MNG_COMPANY_CATEGORY c on i.mng_comp_ctg_no=c.mng_comp_ctg_no where l.apt_no=#{aptNo} order by contract_no desc
select count(*) from comp_contract_list l join mng_company_info i on l.mng_comp_no=i.mng_comp_no join MNG_COMPANY_CATEGORY c on i.mng_comp_ctg_no=c.mng_comp_ctg_no where l.apt_no=#{aptNo}
